author: georg.leyrer@kurier.at (Georg Leyrer)
articleTitleTranslated: Böhmermann shoots the "#S specialHelden" spot on the refugee crisis
articleContent: "Richtig viele Menschen sind gestorben damals.  Und wir, wir waren faul wie die Waschbären."
articleContentTranslated: "A lot of people died back then. And we, we were lazy like raccoons."
